name: Vanwyrm

ability.name: Aerial Marauder
ability.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Increases damage player deals to enemy weak points while mounted.

description:
The melodies of a flute made from the exoskeleton of a Vanwyrm are said to cross the whole mountain ranges.
In ages past, such flutes were used to signal an attack.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Ignis Blast
skills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Spirit Fire
skills.description: Shoots fireballs towards an enemy. The fireballs explode after a short distance, generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.

skills.name: Ignis Breath
skills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Nightmare Ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Fire Ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.

skills.name: Dark Laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
